name.en: Science and Practices of Crystal Growth
name.ch: 晶體成長之科學與實作

remark.en: MST program. Only students of the MST can take the course. Class time: Tuesday 14:10-17:00. Classroom: P101, IoP, AS.
remark.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。二/14:10-17:00，中研院物理所P101

goal.en: Upon completing this course, the student should understand the basic crystal growth phenomena, phase diagram, and can describe various growth methods and characterization techniques for crystal. The students are expected to successfully grow single crystals (e.g., CuSO4, KH2PO4, MoTe2, MoS2, SrFeO3-x etc.), and are capable of using X-ray technique to perform basic characterization.
goal.ch: 完成本課程後，學生應了解基本的晶體生長現象、相圖，並能描述晶體的各種生長方法和量測技術。 預期學生能成功生長單晶（例如，CuSO4、KH2PO4、MoTe2、MoS2、SrFeO3-x 等），並能夠使用X 光技術進行基本量測。

content.en:
Introduction to crystals
Ideal crystals and real crystals, and growth mechanisms
Binary phase diagrams and phase rules (I)
Binary phase diagrams, melting and crystallization (I)
Crystal growth method and equipment (I): solution growth (Lecture and Lab)
Crystal growth method and equipment (II-a): solid state synthesis (Lecture and Lab)
Crystal growth method and equipment (II-b): X-ray powder diffraction (Lecture and Lab)
Overview of other crystal growth methods and equipment
Midterm exam
Lab: crystal growth by chemical vapor transport, flux growth, and floating zone (lab rotation shift #1)
Lab: crystal growth by chemical vapor transport, flux growth, and floating zone (lab rotation shift #2)
Lab: crystal growth by chemical vapor transport, flux growth, and floating zone (lab rotation shift #3)
Lab: single crystal examination: Laue X-ray diffraction and optical microscopy
Merits and limitations of various crystal growth methods
Selected methods for further crystal characterization (I)
Selected methods for further crystal characterization (II) U+A1V results from the crystals grown in lab sessions
Final semester week: StudentsU+A1U+A6 report submission
content.ch:
晶體簡介
理想晶體和真實晶體，以及生長機制
二元相圖和有相律(I)
二元相圖、熔化和結晶 (I)
晶體生長方法及設備 (I): 溶液長晶法 (授課和實驗室)
晶體生長方法及設備 (II-a): 固態合成法 (授課和實驗室)
晶體生長方法及設備 (II-b): X光粉末繞射法 (授課和實驗室)
其他晶體生長方法和設備概述
期中考
實驗室: 以化學氣相傳輸、助熔劑生長法和浮區法生長的晶體 (實驗室輪替 #1)
實驗室: 以化學氣相傳輸、助熔劑生長法和浮區法生長的晶體 (實驗室輪替 #2)
實驗室: 以化學氣相傳輸、助熔劑生長法和浮區法生長的晶體 (實驗室輪替 #3)
實驗室: 單晶測試: 勞厄X光繞射和光學顯微鏡
各種晶體生長方法的優缺點
進一步晶體量測的選定方法 (I)
進一步晶體量測的選定方法 (II) +在實驗室中生長的晶體U+A1V 結果
期末週: 學生繳交U+A1U+A6報告
